ThingDef.label: coal lamp
ThingDef.description: A simple lamp that consumes solid fuel for its work.

ThingDef.label: high coal lamp
ThingDef.description: A simple lamp that consumes solid fuel for its work.

ThingDef.label: candles
ThingDef.description: A candle to prevent darkness seeping in your room.

ThingDef.label: candle stand
ThingDef.description: A candle stand to prevent darkness seeping in your room.

ThingDef.label: bird post
ThingDef.description: A small stuffed animal of a dead bird, made of leather and metal fittings.

ThingDef.label: Sea lantern
ThingDef.description: A small lantern with a special reagent that allows you to use salt as fuel.

ThingDef.label: Flag
ThingDef.description: Cloth cloth with some symbol.

ThingDef.label: Bed camping tent
ThingDef.description: Tent for a comfortable stay on a hike. Designed for two people.

ThingDef.label: Storage camping tent
ThingDef.description: A tent to keep items dry while camping.

ThingDef.label: Sleeping cocoon
ThingDef.description: Cocoon of arachnids for a comfortable sleep.

ThingDef.label: Double sleeping cocoon
ThingDef.description: Cocoon of arachnids for a comfortable sleep.

ThingDef.label: Old clock
ThingDef.description: A tall clock that tells the time.

ThingDef.label: modern clock
ThingDef.description: A tall clock that tells the time. Has a modern aesthetic.

ThingDef.label: Archaeological installation
ThingDef.description: Miniature dinosaur exhibition.

ThingDef.label: Glowing pillar
ThingDef.description: Design lamp for lighting.

ThingDef.label: Futuristic lamp
ThingDef.description: Design lamp for lighting.

ThingDef.label: Tall floor lamp
ThingDef.description: Design lamp for lighting.

ThingDef.label: Street light
ThingDef.description: Design lamp for lighting.

ThingDef.label: dog house
ThingDef.description: A small house typically used for pets, like dogs, to have a space to shelter in whilst outdoors.

ThingDef.label: bin
ThingDef.description: A small bin for trash. Too small to provide any meaningful reduction in a room's dirtiness, it at least makes a space feel more lived in.

ThingDef.label: trophy
ThingDef.description: A single trophy, allowing you to show off your achievements - real or imagined.

ThingDef.label: laptop
ThingDef.description: A small, personal computer of a brand favoured by artists across the human diaspora. Whilst not functionally useful to a rimworld colony, it is something of a status symbol to own one.

ThingDef.label: plushie
ThingDef.description: A small, cute plush animal in the shape of a stylised bear/cat/dog/bunny. Typically a toy for children, but adults can find them comforting too.

ThingDef.label: skeleton statue
ThingDef.description: A sculpted replica of a human skeleton wielding a spear and shield. A grim decoration often placed within catacombs and ossuraries.

ThingDef.label: imp statue
ThingDef.description: A grim sculpture depicting a lesser demon perching. Often used to decorate tombs and crypts, it is said to guard the dead and scare away spirits and ghosts.

ThingDef.label: gargoyle statue
ThingDef.description: A sculpture of a Gargoyle, watchdog of the dead often depicted as bat-winged demons able the breath fire and torment the less fortunate. Now they are used as symbols of fear to scare away the spirits from sacred grounds.

ThingDef.label: demon statue
ThingDef.description: A large sculpture depicting a demon. Creature of hell sent to torture the miscreants and wrongdoers alike. Although this is but a statue some believe that malicious spirits inhabits them.
